title: Round Table: AI for Good – Shaping a Smarter, Sustainable Tomorrow
location: Andhra Pradesh Lounge at Atlantis (Ground Floor), Grandhotel Belvedere, 89 Promenade

sections.body: This roundtable aims to convene leaders and experts to discuss AI-driven solutions for the public good. With a focus on healthcare, education, agriculture, and governance, the session seeks to develop a collaborative roadmap for impactful and scalable initiatives that can benefit society.

sections.title: Objectives
sections.body: Andhra Pradesh is harnessing the transformative potential of AI to address its developmental challenges and drive sectoral progress. Key focus areas include: * Economic Growth through AI Partnerships: Partnering with Google and other industry leaders, the state is leveraging AI to foster economic prosperity by creating market-ready solutions, driving innovation, and unlocking new revenue streams. * Enhancing Education and Skill Development: With a 67% literacy rate, AI has the potential to revolutionize learning outcomes by personalizing education, improving youth employability, and advancing skill development initiatives. * Transforming Healthcare Access and Outcomes: AI-driven diagnostics and predictive tools can improve maternal and child nutrition, facilitate early risk assessments, and ensure affordable healthcare delivery, particularly in underserved rural areas. * Boosting Agricultural Productivity and Food Security: AI applications in precision agriculture can optimize crop yield predictions, enhance food security, and strengthen market linkages for farmers. This is critical, as agriculture contributes over 29% to the state's Gross State Domestic Product (GSDP). * Advancing Governance through Data-Driven Insights: By integrating AI into public administration, the state can enhance decision-making, improve service delivery, and promote transparency, establishing Andhra Pradesh as a leader in AI innovation.

sections.title: Exploration Areas
sections.body:
The roundtable will highlight actionable AI use cases to drive transformative impact across key sectors, including:

- Urban mobility optimization.
- Precision agriculture for sustainable farming.
- Predictive healthcare solutions for preventive care.
- Renewable energy management to support sustainability goals.

This session will provide a platform to share insights, discuss challenges, and shape a shared vision for harnessing AI to create a smarter, more sustainable future for Andhra Pradesh.

people.name: Nara Lokesh
people.role: Hon’ble Minister for Human Resource Development, IT, Electronics & Communications, and Real Time Governance

people.name: Vishnu Som
people.role: Group Executive Editor and Senior Anchor

people.name: Daniel Susskind
people.role: Associate Member of the Economics Department
